product_name: REI Mt. Baker Tech-Compatible Soft-Shell Gloves - Kids'
long_description: The REI Mt. Baker tech-compatible soft-shell gloves keep kids' hands cozy and dry while preserving the ability to use a touch-screen device. Conductive material at the tips of the thumbs and index fingers lets kids operate touch-screens without having to take their gloves off. Polyester soft shells help block moisture and wind. Polyester insulation adds warmth; cozy polyester linings add comfort and wick moisture away from the hands. Grippy synthetic leather palms; soft nose-wipe panels on the thumbs; gauntlet wrists with easy cinch closures.
